0.content:
### PWA means Progressive Web App

After setting up this blog, you can load it up on a mobile phone, and by pressing **Add To Home Screen**, you'll get your blog on a nice and (hopefully) pretty application!

### Markdown!

The posts uses markdown to display the content, this means you can easily display images by uploading them somewhere online and then using its direct link to show them in the post. Search for *markdown syntax* !
0.title: PWA and Markdown!

1.content:
there are four items on the blog's menu bar

### 1 - Exchange Arrows - Switch to list
Clicking these arrows will display all the blog posts in a list by title, nothing better than trying it for yourself, go ahead and do it.

### 2 - Address Card - About page
The second item shows the about page. You can configure it all in your user area settings.

### 3 - The blog's name
While it's not set, it'll only appear loading. You can give your blog a name in your user area settings.

### 4 - Keyboard icon - The user area
Click it to login to your area. Here you can create, modify and delete blog posts, and edit your about page!

**that's all there is to it**
1.title: Layout Explanation
